ModMetaData.name: LMC023.苏联军械库
ModMetaData.author: ALIEN
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html привет товарищи 嗨同志们！ This mod is adding to your game weapons from soviet era with custom tech tree and sounds. Everything can be crafted on "Soviet Weapon Table" (under production tab), which you can build after researching "Basic Soviet Rifling". 这个MOD添加了苏联武器，拥有单独的科技树和音效。所有的武器均在苏联武器工作台制造，当然你得先研究基本苏联步枪。 Weapons included : AKM, AKMS, AKS-74U, RPK, SKS, Makarov pistol, AK-74M, SVD Dragunov, Saiga 12K, AK-74, RPG-7V2, RPO-Z Shmel, PP-19 Bison, MR-444, VSS Vintorez. Defensive structures : NSV heavy MG, AGS-17 grenade launcher. 添加的武器：AKM, AKMS, AKS-74U, RPK, SKS, Makarov pistol, AK-74M, SVD Dragunov, Saiga 12K, AK-74, RPG-7V2, RPO-Z Shmel, PP-19 Bison, MR-444, VSS Vintorez. 添加的固定武器：NSV heavy MG, AGS-17 grenade launcher. Now comrade, you can shoot those bloody capitalist pigs in the name of workers class and glory of Soviet Union ! （这句拒绝翻译） If you like this mod remember to rate it, thank you :) 如果你喜欢这个MOD，记得给作者点赞，当然也别忘记给辛苦的汉化狗—————也就是我点赞。 汉化：jxb12306
